definition: to be duty bound/to be one's unshirkable responsibility
duty/responsibility/to reproach/to blame
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
to lend on interest/to borrow/a loan/leniency/to make excuses/to pardon/to forgive

sentences.english: To change this from the root, the government is duty-bound.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上改變這一狀況，政府責無旁貸。

sentences.english: Of course, is the duty of the business sector.
sentences.chinese: 工商部門當然是責無旁貸。

sentences.english: Global dollars are essential to this success, but the buck stops with us.
sentences.chinese: 全球資金是獲得成功的關鍵，但我們責無旁貸。

sentences.english: That helping disadvantaged groups is the indispensable duty of WEIKAQI.
sentences.chinese: 幫助弱勢羣體維咔奇責無旁貸。

sentences.english: Macao from all walks of life indicated in abundance that maintains the national security to be duty-bound.
sentences.chinese: 澳門各界紛紛表示，維護國家安全責無旁貸。
履行諾言將是責無旁貸的。

sentences.english: It is a new duty-bound task for the university library to develop information services for the community.
sentences.chinese: 開展社區信息服務是高校圖書館責無旁貸的新使命。

sentences.english: The continuous development of staff and progress is duty-bound responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 員工的不斷髮展與進步是公司責無旁貸的責任。

sentences.english: Zhongzhi can into the city, sand-to-tower, we obliged.
sentences.chinese: 衆志才能成城，聚沙才能成塔，我們責無旁貸。

sentences.english: The People's Party group, as the largest political group in the European Parliament, is duty-bound in every means.
sentences.chinese: 人民黨黨團作爲歐洲議會第一大黨團更是責無旁貸。
就我來說，幫助他是責無旁貸的。

sentences.english: Attaches great importance to the system civilization construction is the duty-bound historical duty of the ruling party.
sentences.chinese: 高度重視制度文明建設是執政黨責無旁貸的歷史責任。

definition: bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
security forces

milieu/social environment
